#
#
# This shell script is dropped by Sudo for Android Installer upon instalation
# The path of this script should be /system/xbin/sudo or /su/xbin/sudo
# To properly remove this script from your system, please use Sudo Installer
# DO NOT edit this file unless you know what you are doing
#
#
su -c "$*"
